Engine

Stable

File formats

A table of Halo Wars data formats, including Granny, WWise, and custom content archives.

Content article

Formats table

Format Category Description Reference
Granny Mesh (.gm) Geometry Primary mesh archive, compatible with Granny 2.1. Core README
WWise Bank (.bnk) Audio Audio banks produced by WWise 2015 and consumed by Halo Wars 1. Content README
Spam Archive (.f32) Sounds Holds sound effects mapped to WWise events. Content README
Model Pack (.p3d) Geometry Bundled content read by Granny exporters. Core README
Effect Archive (.fls) FX Visual effect set used by the engine's particle systems. Core README
Localized text (.lrp) Localization Structured localized strings and glyph tables. Content README
Transparency (.xtt) Shaders Shader permutations and pipeline hints consumed by the renderer. Core README
Custom Constants (.csf) Script Configuration tables used across the engine. Core README
